title: (x) Ultra Condensed sans serif used in self initiated Delta boarding pass redesign - Titling Gothic {Jarrod B}
content:
Hello all,

I need help identifying this condensed sans

At first i thought it was Univers, but a closer look proved me wrong.

Your assistance is appreciated.

[http://passfail.squarespace.com/storage/pass-designed.png?\_\_SQUARESPACE\_...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100309103302/http:/passfail.squarespace.com/storage/pass-designed.png?__SQUARESPACE_CACHEVERSION=1262312168492 "http://passfail.squarespace.com/storage/pass-designed.png?\_\_SQUARESPACE\_CACHEVERSION=1262312168492")

[http://passfail.squarespace.com/storage/pass-blue-1.png?\_\_SQUARESPACE\_CA...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100309103302/http:/passfail.squarespace.com/storage/pass-blue-1.png?__SQUARESPACE_CACHEVERSION=1262215797045 "http://passfail.squarespace.com/storage/pass-blue-1.png?\_\_SQUARESPACE\_CACHEVERSION=1262215797045")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100309103302im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pass-designed_5789.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100309103302im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pass-blue-1_3790.png)
author: typenerd

comments.content: [Looks like what Feltron used for his annual reports](http://web.archive.org/web/20100309103302/http:/typophile.com/node/47969).

Titling Gothic

(It's right on the blog.)

Felton has also used [Heroic Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20100309103302/http:/typetide.tumblr.com/post/314135952/heroic-condensed-font) and [FF Good](http://web.archive.org/web/20100309103302/http:/typetide.tumblr.com/post/240085446/type-ff-meta-serif-ff-good-source-feltron) as his narrow sans.
